CHAT.comment: LORILLARD TOBACCO COMPANY, ET AL., Petitioners v. THOMAS F. REILLY, ATTORNEY GENERAL OF MASSACHUSETTS, ET AL.; and ALTADIS U.S.A. INC., ETC., ET AL., Petitioners v. THOMAS F. REILLY, ATTORNEY GENERAL OF MASSACHUSETTS, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:12 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY S. SUTTON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM W. PORTER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA D. UNDERWOOD ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY S. SUTTON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:11 a.m, the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
